channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cooking Data

item.title: 5 steps to formulate good questions for data analysis
item.description: In my years as a data scientist, I noticed how important and difficult it is to find the right questions. Data analysis is more fun when you know what to ask. Good questions make your results easier to understand, reduce the time needed for analysis, and lead to conclusions you can act upon. So how do you find them? Let us take a practical exercise in which I will guide you on how to formulate questions for data science problems.
